description: Svenska Aerogel Holding AB provides recyclable aerogel materials. The company is headquartered in Gavle, Gavleborg and currently employs 13 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-12-20. The firm's product Quartzene is a nano-porous amorphous silica based material with variety applications, such as insulation, filtration, paint and coatings, among others. The product can be obtained in the form of a fine powder, granules, pellets, or as a paste. The company can easily be mixed in different paints and coatings. The Quartzene can be used as an additive in industrial, construction and coating products for thermal and acoustic insulation. The firm's technology can be used for molecular filtration, liquid filtration, water and beverages filtration, among others. The firm also offers customized solutions.
naicsNationalIndustry: All Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing
name: Svenska Aerogel Holding AB (publ)
